name: c076dc47-a24a-435b-8a2d-34e1097b6560
description: Use this tool ONLY for complex questions involving relationships, hidden connections, multi-hop reasoning, or patterns between entities (e.g., 'How is X related to Y?' or 'Find the common link between A and B'). Do NOT use this for simple definitions or summaries; use the Data Store for those. This tool accesses the GraphRAG knowledge base.
